DescriptionData.Title: HMS Deluxe Vinyl Clown Shoes - RWB Stars & Stripes
DescriptionData.Description: These vinyl clown shoes are actual shoes, not shoe covers, with heavy duty rubber soles. Very good quality for the price. One size fits most, small shoe sizes can wear them with a sneaker or a gel insole inside. Hollow toes which can be stuffed with foam or other padding if desired. Fits up to men's size 12 and are 15" in length.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Vinyl clown shoes with heavy duty rubber soles
One size fits most, small shoe sizes can wear them with a sneaker or a gel insole inside
Hollow toes which can be stuffed with foam or other padding if desired
Fits up to men's size 12 and are 15" in length
Economy clown shoes may have small flaws due to the manufacturing process
